programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A doctor arrested for sexually abusing his patients is set free after Cassidy's testimony causes a mistrial.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A girl's tragic death becomes a criminal case when a surgeon harvests her organs without parental consent.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A 10-year-old girl taken from her mother at the U.S.-Mexico border ends up in a sex-trafficking ring in New York, and Benson and Stone fight to reunite the girl with her mother; Rollins confesses to her ex.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A serial rapist strikes again after two decades of silence, and SVU is determined to uncover the elusive criminal and bring justice to his many victims; Stone discovers that his father worked on the case before it went cold.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and the team investigate the death of a prostitute at a brothel; they wonder if there was foul play or if this could be a case of a junkie who relapsed, turned to tricking, got depressed and committed suicide.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A bitter separation pits a husband and wife (Blair Underwood, Michael Michele) against each other as they try to gain custody of their daughter (Tiffany Evans).

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Fin is asked to look into a case of rape at his son's college, where he meets a Brooklyn detective (Adam Beach) who is investigating a similar crime.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a mob lawyer (Cary Elwes) and his wife are attacked, their young son is the only witness; when he comes out of surgery, the man vividly remembers his daughter at the crime scene.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An overzealous reporter's accusation leads a despondent new mother (Ashley Williams) to kill herself; detectives continue to search for the mother's missing child as time gets shorter.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After a female pundit is assaulted during a protest, Benson and Barba struggle to put their political beliefs aside to help bring the attacker to justice.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: When District 21 goes after a Colombian drug gang following a series of brutal slayings, an asset in the investigation emerges.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Antonio believes a Colombian gang is involved in his son's kidnapping; Halstead learns new information about Lindsay; Voight offers Antonio a new way to get information about Diego's whereabouts.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Voight and the team check out a house that has been associated with a series of gangs; people from the past cause Halstead's temper to rise.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Olinsky tries to protect his daughter; a counterfeiting operation is investigated; when a hoarder is arrested, more than clutter is uncovered.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Atwater and Burgess must keep their new patrol car in mint condition; the Intelligence Unit uncovers drug smuggling; Voight's behavior toward Lindsay drives her right where he doesn't want her; tensions rise between Olinsky and Ruzek.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: New York's SVU agents Fin and Rollins help track down a serial killer who rapes his victims; Burgess gets an opportunity to prove herself; Lindsay brings Halstead as her date to her high school reunion.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Voight's son may be involved with the Fitori murder case, intensifying tension between Antonio and Voight; Ruzek helps Burgess get retribution.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: The Firehouse 51 crew has a Thanksgiving to remember when drugs, a car accident, and a gang shooting get in the way of traditional holiday pastimes.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Peter is deeply upset when a young victim is discovered at the site of a train accident; an abusive mother takes dire actions; Severide's injury is aggravated.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Jose Vargas is forced to go on disability after sustaining an injury in a fire; Severide receives a tempting invitation from a woman he saved from a car crash; Cruz tries to end his brother's involvement with a gang.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: An expensive necklace goes missing at the scene of a fire, leading to an internal investigation; Cruz makes a desperate decision to save his brother from a gang war; Dawson invites Casey to a party.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Cruz struggles with guilt and decides to make a confession to Casey; Severide asks Dawson for help with his injury; Herrmann is faced with an unpleasant business deal.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Severide finally decides to discuss his injury with Chief Boden; Casey deals with family issues; Dawson responds to a rescue call and realizes a young girl is the only survivor.

programme.title: The Rock
programme.desc: A scientist (Nicolas Cage) and a British spy (Sean Connery) who once escaped from Alcatraz are sent to the former island prison to stop a disgruntled war hero (Ed Harris) from obliterating San Francisco with chemical warheads.

programme.title: The Rock
programme.desc: A scientist (Nicolas Cage) and a British spy (Sean Connery) who once escaped from Alcatraz are sent to the former island prison to stop a disgruntled war hero (Ed Harris) from obliterating San Francisco with chemical warheads.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry enlists an unlikely ally to help him save Patience.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A successful preacher (Tim Daly) is the prime suspect in a murder case, until his wife (Kathy Baker) provides detectives with a taped conversation.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The only witness to the beating of a woman (Judy Kuhn) is her daughter (Paulina Gerzon) who has Williams syndrome.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives discover a kidnapped girl in the trunk of a stolen rental car; the suspect's rage seriously injures Stabler; the trial forces Novak to face dark things in her past.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When an infant goes missing, members of the SVU find themselves taking sides in a family's right-to-die court case; Barba's interference in the case puts the entire DA's office in jeopardy.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry enlists an unlikely ally to help him save Patience.

programme.title: Live: 2025 AIG Women's Open
programme.desc: Watch the opening round of the AIG Women's Open at Royal Porthcawl Golf Club in Porthcawl, Wales.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a polygamist's wife is murdered, he fears his testimony in a separate case may have led to her death; a Web site exposes potential witnesses.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A wealthy teen is found murdered in New York's Central Park, and the clues lead to a gang of homeless children.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A woman's body is found in a park alongside a man with a bullet in his head.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The case of a teenage girl assaulted in the projects leads to a startling discovery; Benson puts her trust in someone from her past.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Amaro asks the SVU for help in clearing a convicted man's name and brings a figure from Benson's past back into her life.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a popular fighter doesn't show up for the biggest bout of the year, Rollins and Velasco are drawn into a complicated web of secrets; McGrath confides in Benson.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Carisi's niece helps a friend report a sexual assault; Benson investigates a college's secret society that preys on female students.
